item.title: Un resumen de CDSB 2018: el inicio de una comunidad
item.description: Organizing an event is a lot of work, much more than you plan for it. But harvesting the fruits of a successful event makes the workload worth it. In July, we kicked off the first Bioconductor Latin American Developers Workshop 2018 (LatAmBioc2018). The main goals of this meeting were to encourage the development of the Bioconductor project in Mexico and to start a community of Mexican bioinformatic software developers â€“ the Community of Bioinformatic Software Developers (CDSB, from its acronym in Spanish).
